Town Planning Zones

TP Zones of Dholera SIR

Understanding TP (Town Planning) Zones is crucial for selecting the right investment in Dholera SIR. These zones define how each area will grow and what appreciation potential an investor can expect.

What Are TP Zones?

TP Zones are officially planned land development schemes created by the Dholera Authority. Every TP scheme includes organised land usage — residential, commercial, industrial, green zones, and public utility areas.

Why TP Zones Are Important for Investors

Legally Strong & Verified

Official government-approved land with clear documentation

Clear Land Titles

Transparent planning with verified ownership records

Well-Developed Infrastructure

Organized road networks and planned utility systems

Higher Appreciation

Structured planning ensures better long-term returns

Main TP Zones in Dholera SIR

Highest Priority

TP 1 to TP 6

Activation Area

Highest development priority; closest to expressways, airport zone, and ABCD building

Prime Location
Airport Proximity
Expressway Access
ABCD Building
High Priority

TP 7 to TP 12

Fast-Growing

Fast-growing residential + commercial development with excellent connectivity

Long-Term

Best for early-stage investors seeking long-term appreciation and value growth
